Name: Beast Ball
Desc: A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts.

Name: Cherish Ball
Desc: A quite rare Poké Ball that has been specially crafted to commemorate an occasion of some sort.

Name: Dive Ball
Desc: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on Pokémon that live underwater.

Name: Poké Ball (Hisui)
Desc: A mysterious ball that can be thrown at wild Pokémon in order to catch them. These balls can be crafted by hand if you gather the necessary materials.

Name: Dream Ball
Desc: A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon while they’re asleep.

Name: Dusk Ball
Desc: A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon at night or in dark places such as caves.

Name: Fast Ball
Desc: A Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokémon which are quick to run away.

Name: Great Ball (Hisui)
Desc: A good, high-performance Poké Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a standard Poké Ball.

Name: Friend Ball
Desc: A strange Poké Ball that will make the wild Pokémon caught with it more friendly toward you immediately.

Name: Great Ball
Desc: A mysterious ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a standard Poké Ball

Name: Heal Ball
Desc: A remedial Poké Ball that restores the caught Pokémon’s HP and eliminates any status problem.

Name: Ultra Ball (Hisui)
Desc: A mysterious ball that provides an even higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a Great Ball does.

Name: Heavy Ball
Desc: A Poké Ball that is better than usual at catching very heavy Pokémon.

Name: Level Ball
Desc: A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that are a lower level than your own.

Name: Love Ball
Desc: A Poké Ball that works best when catching a Pokémon that is of the opposite gender of your Pokémon.

Name: Heavy Ball (Hisui)
Desc: A ball that is too heavy to fly high or far, but it is highly effective if you manage to hit an unsuspecting Pokémon.

Name: Lure Ball
Desc: A Poké Ball that is good for catching Pokémon that you reel in with a Rod while out fishing.

Name: Luxury Ball
Desc: A comfortable Poké Ball that makes a caught wild Pokémon quickly grow friendly.

Name: Master Ball
Desc: A comfortable Poké Ball that makes a caught wild Pokémon quickly grow friendly.

Name: Leaden Ball
Desc: An improvement on the original Heavy Ball design. A ball that is too heavy to fly high or far, but it is highly effective if you manage to hit an unsuspecting Pokémon.

Name: Moon Ball
Desc: A Poké Ball that will make it easier to catch Pokémon that can evolve using a Moon Stone.

Name: Nest Ball
Desc: A somewhat different Poké Ball that becomes more effective the lower the level of the wild Pokémon.

Name: Net Ball
Desc: A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when attempting to catch Water- or Bug-type Pokémon.

Name: Gigaton Ball
Desc: The ultimate iteration of the Heavy Ball. A ball that is too heavy to fly high or far, but it is highly effective if you manage to hit an unsuspecting Pokémon.

Name: Park Ball
Desc: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.

Name: Poke Ball
Desc: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It’s thrown like a ball at a Pokémon, comfortably encapsulating its target.

Name: Premier Ball
Desc: A somewhat rare Poké Ball that was made as a commemorative item used to celebrate an event of some sort.

Name: Feather Ball
Desc: A ball that flies fast and true—ideal for catching nimble Pokémon or Pokémon that fly high in the air.

Name: Quick Ball
Desc: A somewhat different Poké Ball that has a more successful catch rate if used at the start of a wild encounter.

Name: Repeat Ball
Desc: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on Pokémon species that were previously caught.

Name: Safari Ball
Desc: A special Poké Ball that is used only in the Great Marsh. It is recognizable by the camouflage pattern decorating it.

Name: Wing Ball
Desc: An improvement on the original Feather Ball design. A ball that flies fast and true—ideal for catching nimble Pokémon or Pokémon that fly high in the air.

Name: Sport Ball
Desc: A special Poké Ball that is used during the Bug-Catching Contest.

Name: Timer Ball
Desc: A somewhat different Poké Ball that becomes progressively more effective at catching Pokémon the more turns that are taken in battle.

Name: Ultra Ball
Desc: An ultra-high-performance Poké Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a Great Ball.

Name: Jet Ball
Desc: The ultimate iteration of the Feather Ball. A ball that flies fast and true—ideal for catching nimble Pokémon or Pokémon that fly high in the air.

Name: Origin Ball
Desc: A singular and irreplicable Poké Ball that can be used to catch the frenzied Pokémon raging at the Temple of Sinnoh.

Name: Strange Ball
Desc: A Placeholder Poké Ball

Name: Rocket Ball
Desc: Team Rocket’s Poké Ball

Name: Magma Ball
Desc: Team Magma’s Poké Ball

Name: Aqua Ball
Desc: Team Aqua’s Poké Ball

Name: Galactic Ball
Desc: Team Galactic’s Poké Ball

Name: Plasma Ball
Desc: Team Plasma’s Poké Ball

Name: Flare Ball
Desc: Team Flare’s Poké Ball

Name: Skull Ball
Desc: Team Skull’s Poké Ball

Name: Aether Ball
Desc: Aether Foundation’s Poké Ball

Name: Yell Ball
Desc: Team Yell’s Poké Ball

Name: Rainbow Ball
Desc: A Rainbow colored Poké Ball

Name: Ability Capsule
Desc: A capsule that heals 200 HP.

Name: Antidote
Desc: A spray-type medicine. It lifts the effect of poison from one Pokémon and heals 20 HP.

Name: Awakening
Desc: A spray-type medicine. It awakens a Pokémon from the clutches of sleep and heals 20 HP.

Name: Berry Juice
Desc: A 100% pure juice made of Berries. It restores the HP of one Pok��mon by just 20 points

Name: Big Malasada
Desc: The Alola region’s local specialty���fried bread. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pok��m

Name: Burn Heal
Desc: A spray-type medicine. It heals a single Pokémon that is suffering from a burn and heals 20 HP.

Name: Calcium
Desc: A nutritious drink for Pok��mon. It raises the base Sp. Atk (Special Attack) stat of a single Pok��mo

Name: Carbos
Desc: A nutritious drink for Pok��mon. It raises the base Speed stat of a single Pok��mo

Name: Casteliacone
Desc: Castelia City’s specialty, soft-serve ice cream. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pok��mon

Name: Clever Wing
Desc: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the Sp. Def base points of a single Pokémon and heals 10 HP.

Name: Elixir
Desc: This medicine can be used to restore 10 PP to each of the moves that have been learned by a Pokémon and heals 10 HP.

Name: Energy Powder
Desc: A very bitter medicine powder. It restores the HP of one Pok��mon by 50 points

Name: Energy Root
Desc: A very bitter root. It restores the HP of one Pok��mon by 200 points

Name: Ether
Desc: This medicine can be used to restore 10 PP to a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokémon and heals 10 HP.

Name: Fresh Water
Desc: Water with a high mineral content. It restores the HP of one Pok��mon by 50 points

Name: Full Heal
Desc: A spray-type medicine that is broadly effective. It can be used to fully restore the HP of a single Pokémon and heal any status conditions it has

Name: Full Restore
Desc: A spray-type medicine that can be used to fully restore the HP of a single Pokémon and heal any status conditions it has.

Name: Genius Wing
Desc: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the Sp. Atk base points of a single Pokémon and heals 10 HP.

Name: Heal Powder
Desc: A very bitter medicine powder. It heals all the status problems of a single Pok��mon

Name: Health Wing
Desc: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the HP base points of a single Pokémon and heals 10 HP.

Name: Hp Up
Desc: A nutritious drink for Pok��mon. It raises the base HP of a single Pok��mo

Name: Hyper Potion
Desc: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 120 HP to a single Pokémon.

Name: Ice Heal
Desc: A spray-type medicine for treating freezing. It can be used to thaw out a single Pokémon that has been frozen solid and heal 20 HP.

Name: Iron
Desc: A nutritious drink for Pok��mon. It raises the base Defense stat of a single Pok��mo

Name: Lava Cookie
Desc: Lavaridge Town’s local specialty. It heals all the status problems of one Pok��mon

Name: Lemonade
Desc: A very sweet drink. It restores the HP of one Pok��mon by 80 points

Name: Lumiose Galette
Desc: A popular treat in Lumiose City. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pok��mon

Name: Max Elixir
Desc: This medicine can be used to fully restore the PP of all of the moves that have been learned by a Pokémon and heal 10 HP.

Name: Max Ether
Desc: This medicine can be used to fully restore the PP of a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokémon and heal 10 HP.

Name: Max Potion
Desc: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to completely restore the max HP of a single Pokémon.

Name: Max Revive
Desc: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokémon. It also fully restores a fainted Pokémon’s maximum HP.

Name: Moomoo Milk
Desc: Milk with a very high nutrition content. It restores the HP of one Pok��mon by 100 points

Name: Muscle Wing
Desc: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the Attack base points of a single Pokémon and heals 10 HP.

Name: Old Gateau
Desc: Old Chateau’s hidden specialty. It heals all the status problems of a single Pok��mon

Name: Paralyze Heal
Desc: A spray-type medicine. It eliminates paralysis from a single Pokémon and heals 20 HP.

Name: Potion
Desc: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 20 HP to a single Pokémon.

Name: Pp Max
Desc: It maximally raises the top PP of a selected move that has been learned by the target Pok��mon

Name: Pp Up
Desc: It slightly raises the maximum PP of a selected move that has been learned by the target Pok��mon

Name: Protein
Desc: A nutritious drink for Pok��mon. It raises the base Attack stat of a single Pok��mo

Name: Rage Candy Bar
Desc: A famous Mahogany Town candy tourists like to buy and take home. It restores the HP of one Pok��mon by 20 points

Name: Rare Candy
Desc: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will instantly raise the level of a single Pokémon by one.

Name: Resist Wing
Desc: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the Defense base points of a single Pokémon and heals 10 HP.

Name: Revival Herb
Desc: A very bitter medicinal herb. It revives a fainted Pok��mon, fully restoring its HP

Name: Revive
Desc: A medicine that can be used to revive a single Pokémon that has fainted. It also restores half of the Pokémon’s max HP.

Name: Sacred Ash
Desc: This rare ash can revive all fainted Pokémon in a party. In doing so, it also fully restores their maximum HP.

Name: Shalour Sable
Desc: Shalour City’s famous shortbread. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pok��mon

Name: Soda Pop
Desc: A fizzy soda drink. It restores the HP of one Pok��mon by 60 points

Name: Super Potion
Desc: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 60 HP to a single Pokémon.

Name: Sweet Heart
Desc: A piece of cloyingly sweet chocolate. It can be used to restore 20 HP to a single Pokémon.

Name: Swift Wing
Desc: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the Speed base points of a single Pokémon and heals 10 HP.

Name: Zinc
Desc: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the Sp. Def base points of a single Pokémon.

Name: Dire Hit
Desc: An item that raises the critical-hit ratio greatly. It can be used only once and wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Name: Guard Spec
Desc: An item that prevents stat reduction among the Trainer’s party Pokémon for five turns after use.

Name: X Accuracy
Desc: An item that sharply boosts the accuracy of a Pokémon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Name: X Attack
Desc: An item that sharply boosts the Attack stat of a Pokémon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Name: X Defense
Desc: An item that sharply boosts the Defense stat of a Pokémon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Name: X Sp Atk
Desc: An item that sharply boosts the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokémon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Name: X Sp Def
Desc: An item that sharply boosts the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Name: X Speed
Desc: An item that sharply boosts the Speed stat of a Pokémon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Name: Bottle Cap
Desc: A beautiful bottle cap that gives off a silver gleam. Some people are happy to receive one.

Name: Discount Coupon
Desc: This special coupon allows you to buy items at a discount when you are shopping at a boutique but it is currently not accepted.

Name: Dynite Ore
Desc: Mysterious ore that can be obtained in the Max Lair. Something good will happen if you give it to a collector in the Crown Tundra.

Name: Escape Rope
Desc: A long and durable rope. Use it to escape instantly from locations like caves or dungeons.

Name: Fluffy Tail
Desc: A toy that attracts the attention of a Pokémon. It guarantees escape from any battle with wild Pokémon.

Name: Gold Bottle Cap
Desc: A beautiful bottle cap that gives off a golden gleam. Some people are happy to receive one.

Name: Heart Scale
Desc: A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is extremely rare. Some people are happy to receive one.

Name: Honey
Desc: A sweet honey collected by Pokémon. It has a lush aroma and can be sold at a low price to shops.

Name: Max Repel
Desc: An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon from jumping out at you for a while. It lasts longer than Super Repel.

Name: Pink Nectar
Desc: The flower nectar obtained at the flowering shrubs on Royal Avenue. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Poke Doll
Desc: A doll that attracts the attention of a Pokémon. It guarantees escape from any battle with wild Pokémon.

Name: Poke Toy
Desc: A toy that attracts the attention of a Pokémon. It guarantees escape from any battle with wild Pokémon.

Name: Purple Nectar
Desc: A flower nectar obtained at Poni Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Red Nectar
Desc: A flower nectar obtained at Ula’ula Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Repel
Desc: An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon from jumping out at you for a while.

Name: Soothe Bell
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The comforting chime of this bell calms the holder, making it friendly.

Name: Strange Souvenir
Desc: An ornament depicting a mysterious Pokémon that has been venerated as a guardian deity for an extremely long time in the Alola region.

Name: Yellow Nectar
Desc: A flower nectar obtained at Melemele Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Black Flute
Desc: A flute made from black glass. It makes a single black colored Pokémon more friendly.

Name: Blue Flute
Desc: A flute made from blue glass. It makes a single blue colored Pokémon more friendly.

Name: Red Flute
Desc: A flute made from red glass. It makes a single red colored Pokémon more friendly.

Name: White Flute
Desc: A flute made from white glass. It makes a single white colored Pokémon more friendly.

Name: Yellow Flute
Desc: A flute made from yellow glass. It makes a single yellow colored Pokémon more friendly.

Name: Balm Mushroom
Desc: A rare mushroom that gives off a nice fragrance. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

Name: Big Mushroom
Desc: A very large and rare mushroom. It’s popular with a certain class of collectors.

Name: Big Nugget
Desc: A big nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

Name: Big Pearl
Desc: A quite-large pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

Name: Comet Shard
Desc: A shard that fell to the ground when a comet approached.

Name: Nugget
Desc: A nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

Name: Pearl
Desc: A somewhat-small pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold cheaply to shops.

Name: Pearl String
Desc: Very large pearls that sparkle in a pretty silver color. They can be sold at a high price to shops.

Name: Pretty Wing
Desc: Though this feather is beautiful, it’s just a regular feather and has no effect.

Name: Rare Bone
Desc: A rare bone that is extremely valuable for the study of Pokémon archeology. It can be sold for a high price to shops.

Name: Relic Band
Desc: A heavy bracelet made by an ancient civilization about three thousand years ago.

Name: Relic Copper
Desc: A copper coin used by an ancient civilization about three thousand years ago.

Name: Relic Crown
Desc: A heavy crown made by an ancient civilization about three thousand years ago.

Name: Relic Gold
Desc: A gold coin used by an ancient civilization about three thousand years ago.

Name: Relic Silver
Desc: A silver coin used by an ancient civilization about three thousand years ago.

Name: Relic Statue
Desc: A stone figurine made by an ancient civilization about three thousand years ago.

Name: Relic Vase
Desc: A fragile vase made by an ancient civilization about three thousand years ago.

Name: Shoal Salt
Desc: Pure salt that can be discovered only deep inside the Shoal Cave.

Name: Shoal Shell
Desc: A pretty seashell that was found deep inside the Shoal Cave. It is striped in blue and white.

Name: Star Piece
Desc: A small shard of a beautiful gem that gives off a distinctly red sparkle.

Name: Stardust
Desc: Lovely red sand that flows between the fingers with a loose, silky feel. It can be sold at a low price to shops.

Name: Tiny Mushroom
Desc: A very small and rare mushroom. It’s popular with a certain class of collectors and sought out by them.

Name: Blue Shard
Desc: A small blue shard. It appears to be a fragment of some sort of implement made long ago.

Name: Green Shard
Desc: A small green shard. It appears to be a fragment of some sort of implement made long ago.

Name: Red Shard
Desc: A small red shard. It appears to be a fragment of some sort of implement made long ago.

Name: Yellow Shard
Desc: A small yellow shard. It appears to be a fragment of some sort of implement made long ago.

Name: Berry Sweet
Desc: A berry-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

Name: Chipped Pot
Desc: A peculiar teapot that can make a certain species of Pokémon evolve. It may be chipped, but tea poured from it is delicious.

Name: Clover Sweet
Desc: A clover-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

Name: Cracked Pot
Desc: A peculiar teapot that can make a certain species of Pokémon evolve. It may be cracked, but tea poured from it is delicious.

Name: Dawn Stone
Desc: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like a glittering eye.

Name: Deep Sea Scale
Desc: An item to be held by Clamperl. This scale shines with a faint pink and raises the holder’s Sp. Def stat.

Name: Deep Sea Tooth
Desc: An item to be held by Clamperl. This fang gleams a sharp silver and raises the holder’s Sp. Atk stat.

Name: Dragon Scale
Desc: A thick and tough scale. Dragon-type Pokémon may be holding this item when caught.

Name: Dubious Disc
Desc: A transparent device overflowing with dubious data. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.

Name: Dusk Stone
Desc: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as dark as dark can be.

Name: Electirizer
Desc: A box packed with a tremendous amount of electric energy. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.

Name: Fire Stone
Desc: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. The stone has a fiery orange heart.

Name: Flower Sweet
Desc: A flower-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

Name: Galarica Cuff
Desc: A cuff made from woven-together Galarica Twigs. Giving it to Galarian Slowpoke makes the Pokémon very happy.

Name: Galarica Wreath
Desc: A wreath made from woven-together Galarica Twigs. Placing it on the head of a Galarian Slowpoke makes the Pokémon very happy.

Name: Ice Stone
Desc: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a snowflake pattern in it.

Name: Kings Rock
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder successfully inflicts damage, the target may also flinch.

Name: Leaf Stone
Desc: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a leaf pattern.

Name: Love Sweet
Desc: A heart-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

Name: Magmarizer
Desc: A box packed with a tremendous amount of magma energy. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.

Name: Metal Coat
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a special metallic film that can boost the power of Steel-type moves

Name: Moon Stone
Desc: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as black as the night sky.

Name: Oval Stone
Desc: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It’s as round as a Pokémon Egg.

Name: Prism Scale
Desc: A mysterious scale that causes a certain Pokémon to evolve. It shines in rainbow colors.

Name: Protector
Desc: A protective item of some sort. It is extremely stiff and heavy. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.

Name: Razor Claw
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This sharply hooked claw increases the holder’s critical-hit ratio.

Name: Razor Fang
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder successfully inflicts damage, the target may also flinch.

Name: Reaper Cloth
Desc: A cloth imbued with horrifyingly strong spiritual energy. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.

Name: Ribbon Sweet
Desc: A ribbon-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

Name: Sachet
Desc: A sachet filled with fragrant perfumes that are just slightly too overwhelming. Yet it’s loved by a certain Pokémon.

Name: Shiny Stone
Desc: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It shines with a dazzling light.

Name: Star Sweet
Desc: A star-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

Name: Strawberry Sweet
Desc: A strawberry-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it will spin around happily.

Name: Sun Stone
Desc: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It burns as red as the evening sun.

Name: Sweet Apple
Desc: A peculiar apple that can make a certain species of Pokémon evolve. It’s exceptionally sweet.

Name: Tart Apple
Desc: A peculiar apple that can make a certain species of Pokémon evolve. It’s exceptionally tart.

Name: Thunder Stone
Desc: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a thunderbolt pattern.

Name: Up-Grade
Desc: A transparent device somehow filled with all sorts of data. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.

Name: Water Stone
Desc: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is the blue of a pool of clear water.

Name: Whipped Dream
Desc: A soft and sweet treat made of fluffy, puffy, whipped, and whirled cream. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.

Name: Amaze Mulch
Desc: Mulch to be used in a Berry field. An amazing Mulch with the effects of Rich, Surprise, and Boost Mulch.

Name: Boost Mulch
Desc: Mulch to be used in a Berry field. It increases the Berry harvest that can be grown by diligent watering.

Name: Damp Mulch
Desc: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil. It slows the growth of Berries and causes the soil to dry slower.

Name: Gooey Mulch
Desc: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil. It ups the number of times new plants grow where mature plants withered.

Name: Growth Mulch
Desc: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil. It speeds up the growth of Berries. However, it also dries the soil faster.

Name: Rich Mulch
Desc: Mulch to be used in a Berry field. It increases the Berry harvest without the need for particularly diligent care.

Name: Stable Mulch
Desc: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil. It extends the time ripened Berries remain on their plants before falling.

Name: Surprise Mulch
Desc: Mulch to be used in a Berry field. It causes strange, sudden mutations based on the combination of Berries.

Name: Armor Fossil
Desc: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a collar.

Name: Bird Fossil
Desc: The fossil of an ancient Pokémon that once soared through the sky. What it looked like is a mystery.

Name: Claw Fossil
Desc: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a claw.

Name: Cover Fossil
Desc: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived in the sea. It appears as though it could be part of its back.

Name: Dino Fossil
Desc: The fossil of an ancient Pokémon that once lived in the sea. What it looked like is a mystery.

Name: Dome Fossil
Desc: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived in the sea. It could be a shell or carapace.

Name: Drake Fossil
Desc: The fossil of an ancient Pokémon that once roamed the land. What it looked like is a mystery.

Name: Fish Fossil
Desc: The fossil of an ancient Pokémon that once lived in the sea. What it looked like is a mystery.

Name: Helix Fossil
Desc: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived in the sea. It might be a piece of a seashell.

Name: Jaw Fossil
Desc: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It looks as if it could be a piece of a large jaw.

Name: Old Amber
Desc: A piece of amber that still contains the genetic material of an ancient Pokémon. It’s clear with a tawny, reddish tint.

Name: Plume Fossil
Desc: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived in the sky. It looks as if it could come from part of its wing.

Name: Root Fossil
Desc: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived in the sea. It looks as if it could be part of a plant’s root.

Name: Sail Fossil
Desc: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on land. It looks like the impression from a skin sail.

Name: Skull Fossil
Desc: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It appears as though it’s part of a head.

Name: Absorb Bulb
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Atk if the holder is hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.

Name: Adamant Orb
Desc: A brightly gleaming orb to be held by Dialga. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Steel-type moves when it is held.

Name: Adrenaline Orb
Desc: If held by a Pokémon, it boosts Speed when intimidated.

Name: Air Balloon
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder will float in the air until hit. Once the holder is hit, this item will burst.

Name: Amulet Coin
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles any prize money received if the holding Pokémon joins a battle.

Name: Assault Vest
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.

Name: Big Root
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the amount of HP the holder restores from HP-stealing moves.

Name: Binding Band
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a band that increases the power of binding moves used by the holder.

Name: Black Belt
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This belt helps the wearer to focus and boosts the power of Fighting-type moves.

Name: Black Glasses
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a pair of shady-looking glasses that boost the power of Dark-type moves.

Name: Black Sludge
Desc: A held item that gradually restores the HP of Poison-type Pokémon. It inflicts damage on all other types.

Name: Blue Orb
Desc: If used on a Kyogre, allows it to undergo Primal Reversion and become Primal Kyogre

Name: Bright Powder
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It casts a tricky glare that lowers the opposing Pokémon’s accuracy.

Name: Burn Drive
Desc: This item changes a Genesect to its Burn Drive form.

Name: Cell Battery
Desc: A consumable battery. If the holder is hit by an Electric-type move, its Attack will rise.

Name: Charcoal
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a combustible fuel that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.

Name: Chill Drive
Desc: This item changes a Genesect to its Chill Drive form.

Name: Choice Band
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This curious headband boosts Attack but only allows the use of one move.

Name: Choice Scarf
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This curious scarf boosts Speed but only allows the use of one move.

Name: Choice Specs
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These curious glasses boost Sp. Atk but only allow the use of one move.

Name: Cleanse Tag
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the holder is the head of the party.

Name: Damp Rock
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Rain Dance when used by the holder.

Name: Destiny Knot
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder becomes infatuated, the opposing Pokémon will be, too.

Name: Douse Drive
Desc: This item changes a Genesect to its Douse Drive form.

Name: Dragon Fang
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This hard and sharp fang boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.

Name: Eject Button
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder is hit by an attack, it will be switched out of battle.

Name: Electric Seed
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Electric Terrain. It can only be used once.

Name: Everstone
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A Pokémon holding this peculiar stone is prevented from evolving.

Name: Eviolite
Desc: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held by a Pokémon that can still evolve, it raises both Defense and Sp. Def.

Name: Expert Belt
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a well-worn belt that slightly boosts the power of supereffective moves.

Name: Flame Orb
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a bizarre orb that will afflict the holder with a burn during battle.

Name: Float Stone
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This very light stone reduces the weight of a Pokémon when held.

Name: Focus Band
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder may endure a potential KO attack, leaving it with just 1 HP.

Name: Focus Sash
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder has full HP, it will endure a potential KO attack with 1 HP. The item then disappears.

Name: Grassy Seed
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Grassy Terrain. It can only be used once.

Name: Grip Claw
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of multi-turn attacks, such as Bind and Wrap.

Name: Griseous Orb
Desc: A glowing orb to be held by Giratina. It changes its form when used.

Name: Hard Stone
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a durable stone that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

Name: Heat Rock
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Sunny Day when used by the holder.

Name: Icy Rock
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Hail when used by the holder.

Name: Iron Ball
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It lowers Speed and allows Ground-type moves to hit Flying types and holders that are levitating.

Name: Lagging Tail
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is tremendously heavy and makes the holder move slower than usual.

Name: Leftovers
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder’s HP is slowly but steadily restored throughout every battle.

Name: Life Orb
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the power of moves but at the cost of some HP on each hit.

Name: Light Ball
Desc: An item to be held by Pikachu. It’s a puzzling orb that boosts its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

Name: Light Clay
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Protective moves like Light Screen and Reflect will be effective longer.

Name: Lucky Egg
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s an egg filled with happiness that earns the holder extra Exp. Points in battle.

Name: Lucky Punch
Desc: An item to be held by Chansey. This pair of lucky boxing gloves will boost Chansey’s critical-hit ratio.

Name: Lustrous Orb
Desc: A beautifully glowing orb to be held by Palkia. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Water-type moves when it is held.

Name: Magnet
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a powerful magnet that boosts the power of Electric-type moves.

Name: Mental Herb
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder shakes off move-binding effects to move freely. It can be used only once.

Name: Metal Powder
Desc: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Defense stat.

Name: Metronome
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts moves used consecutively but only until a different move is used.

Name: Miracle Seed
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a seed imbued with life-force that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

Name: Misty Seed
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def on Misty Terrain. It can only be used once.

Name: Muscle Band
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This headband exudes strength, slightly boosting the power of physical moves.

Name: Mystic Water
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This teardrop-shaped gem boosts the power of Water-type moves.

Name: Never Melt Ice
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a heat- repelling piece of ice that boosts the power of Ice-type moves.

Name: Poison Barb
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This small, poisonous barb boosts the power of Poison-type moves.

Name: Power Herb
Desc: A single-use item to be held by a Pokémon. It allows the holder to immediately use a move that normally requires a turn to charge.

Name: Protective Pads
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These pads protect the holder from effects caused by making direct contact with the target.

Name: Psychic Seed
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def on Psychic Terrain. It can only be used once.

Name: Quick Claw
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This light, sharp claw lets the bearer move first occasionally.

Name: Quick Powder
Desc: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.

Name: Red Card
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder is hit by an attack, the attacker is removed from battle.

Name: Red Orb
Desc: If used on a Groudon, allows it to undergo Primal Reversion and become Primal Groudon.

Name: Ring Target
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Moves that normally have no effect will land on a Pokémon holding it.

Name: Rocky Helmet
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder is hit, the attacker will also be damaged upon contact.

Name: Rusted Shield
Desc: It is said that a hero used this shield to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it’s grown rusty and worn.

Name: Rusted Sword
Desc: It is said that a hero used this sword to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it’s grown rusty and worn.

Name: Safety Goggles
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These goggles protect the holder from both weather-related damage and powder.

Name: Scope Lens
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a lens for scoping out weak points. It boosts the holder’s critical-hit ratio.

Name: Sharp Beak
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a long, sharp beak that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.

Name: Shed Shell
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This discarded carapace enables the holder to switch out of battle without fail.

Name: Shell Bell
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder restores a little HP every time it inflicts damage on others.

Name: Shock Drive
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder restores a little HP every time it inflicts damage on others.

Name: Silk Scarf
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a sumptuous scarf that boosts the power of Normal-type moves.

Name: Silver Powder
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a shiny silver powder that will boost the power of Bug-type moves.

Name: Smoke Ball
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to flee from any wild Pokémon encounter without fail.

Name: Smooth Rock
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Sandstorm when used by the holder.

Name: Snowball
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Attack if the holder is hit with an Ice-type attack. It can only be used once.

Name: Soft Sand
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a loose, silky sand that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.

Name: Soul Dew
Desc: A wondrous orb to be held by either Latios or Latias. It raises the power of Psychic- and Dragon-type moves.

Name: Spell Tag
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a sinister, eerie tag that boosts the power of Ghost-type moves.

Name: Stick
Desc: An item to be held by Farfetch’d. This very long and stiff stalk of leek boosts its critical-hit ratio.

Name: Sticky Barb
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It damages the holder every turn and may latch on to Pokémon that touch the holder.

Name: Terrain Extender
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the terrain caused by the holder’s move or Ability.

Name: Thick Club
Desc: An item to be held by Cubone or Marowak. It’s a hard bone of some sort that boosts the Attack stat.

Name: Toxic Orb
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a bizarre orb that will badly poison the holder during battle.

Name: Twisted Spoon
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This spoon is imbued with telekinetic power and boosts Psychic-type moves.

Name: Weakness Policy
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Attack and Sp. Atk sharply increase if the holder is hit with a move it’s weak to.

Name: White Herb
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It will restore any lowered stat in battle. It can be used only once.

Name: Wide Lens
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a magnifying lens that slightly boosts the accuracy of moves.

Name: Wise Glasses
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This thick pair of glasses slightly boosts the power of special moves.

Name: Zoom Lens
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder moves after its target moves, its accuracy will be boosted.

Name: Macho Brace
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This stiff, heavy brace helps Pokémon grow strong but cuts Speed in battle.

Name: Power Anklet
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder’s Speed stat to grow more after battling.

Name: Power Band
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder’s Sp. Def stat to grow more after battling.

Name: Power Belt
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder’s Defense stat to grow more after battling.

Name: Power Bracer
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder’s Attack stat to grow more after battling.

Name: Power Lens
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder’s Sp. Atk stat to grow more after battling.

Name: Power Weight
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder’s max HP to grow more after battling.

Name: Full Incense
Desc: This exotic-smelling incense contains a mysterious egg.

Name: Lax Incense
Desc: This beguiling-smelling incense contains a mysterious egg.

Name: Luck Incense
Desc: This aromatic incense contains a mysterious egg.

Name: Odd Incense
Desc: This exotic-smelling incense contains a mysterious egg.

Name: Pure Incense
Desc: This pure-smelling incense contains a mysterious egg.

Name: Rock Incense
Desc: This exotic-smelling incense contains a mysterious egg.

Name: Rose Incense
Desc: This fragrant incense contains a mysterious egg.

Name: Sea Incense
Desc: This curiously aromatic incense contains a mysterious egg.

Name: Wave Incense
Desc: This curiously aromatic incense contains a mysterious egg.

Name: Blue Scarf
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It makes the Pokémon holding it enjoy Dry foods.

Name: Green Scarf
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It makes the Pokémon holding it enjoy Bitter foods.

Name: Pink Scarf
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It makes the Pokémon holding it enjoy Sweet foods.

Name: Red Scarf
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It makes the Pokémon holding it enjoy Spicy foods.

Name: Yellow Scarf
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It makes the Pokémon holding it enjoy Sour foods.

Desc: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Dark-type moves to Dark-type Z-Moves.

Name: Decidium
Desc: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Decidueye’s Spirit Shackle to an exclusive Z-Move.

Name: Dragonium
Desc: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Dragon-type moves to Dragon-type Z-Moves.

Name: Eevium
Desc: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Eevee’s Last Resort to an exclusive Z-Move.

Desc: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Electric-type moves to Electric-type Z-Moves.

Desc: A memory disc that contains Water-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Roto Bargain
Desc: One of the Rotom Powers. It reduces the prices of products at Poké Marts by half but is currently malfunctioning.

Name: Roto Boost
Desc: One of the Rotom Powers. It raises all stats of your battling Pokémon.

Name: Roto Catch
Desc: One of the Rotom Powers. It increases the chance to catch Pokémon a lot.

Name: Roto Encounter
Desc: One of the Rotom Powers. It increases the chance of encountering high-level wild Pokémon a lot for a certain period of time.

Name: Roto Exp Points
Desc: One of the Rotom Powers. It increases the Exp. Points your Pokémon receive after battle a little.

Name: Roto Friendship
Desc: One of the Rotom Powers. It helps Pokémon in your party grow friendly faster.

Name: Roto Hatch
Desc: One of the Rotom Powers. It helps Eggs hatch faster.

Name: Roto Hp Restore
Desc: One of the Rotom Powers. Fully restores the HP of your battling Pokémon.

Name: Roto Pp Restore
Desc: One of the Rotom Powers. Fully restores the PP of your battling Pokémon.

Name: Roto Prize Money
Desc: One of the Rotom Powers. It triples the prize money you receive after battle.

Name: Roto Stealth
Desc: One of the Rotom Powers. It prevents you from encountering wild Pokémon for a certain period of time.

Name: Bug TR
Desc: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

Name: Dark TR
Desc: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

Name: Dragon TR
Desc: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

Name: Electric TR
Desc: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.

Name: Fairy TR
Desc: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

Name: Fighting TR
Desc: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Name: Fire TR
Desc: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This may leave the target with a burn.

Name: Flying TR
Desc: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.

Name: Ghost TR
Desc: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

Name: Grass TR
Desc: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Ground TR
Desc: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

Name: Ice TR
Desc: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

Name: Normal TR
Desc: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

Name: Poison TR
Desc: The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move’s power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

Name: Psychic TR
Desc: Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This may also raise the user’s defensive stats.

Name: Rock TR
Desc: A 5-turn rolling attack that becomes stronger each time it hits.

Name: Steel TR
Desc: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move’s power.

Name: Water TR
Desc: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

Name: Bug TM
Desc: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

Name: Dark TM
Desc: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

Name: Dragon TM
Desc: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.

Name: Electric TM
Desc: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Electric TM
Desc: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

Name: Fairy TM
Desc: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target’s Attack stat.

Name: Fighting TM
Desc: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

Name: Fire TM
Desc: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

Name: Flying TM
Desc: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Ghost TM
Desc: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

Name: Grass TM
Desc: The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

Name: Ground TM
Desc: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

Name: Ice TM
Desc: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

Name: Normal TM
Desc: The user copies the target’s last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.

Name: Poison TM
Desc: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

Name: Psychic TM
Desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

Name: Rock TM
Desc: An ancient power is used to attack. It may also raise all the user’s stats.

Name: Steel TM
Desc: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

Name: Water TM
Desc: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

Name: Blue Petal
Desc: A pressed flower petal from Lana. The goal is to collect seven different kinds of petals.

Name: Green Petal
Desc: A pressed flower petal from Mallow. The goal is to collect seven different kinds of petals.

Name: Orange Petal
Desc: A pressed flower petal from Ilima. The goal is to collect seven different kinds of petals.

Name: Pink Petal
Desc: A pressed flower petal from Mina. The goal is to collect seven different kinds of petals.

Name: Purple Petal
Desc: A pressed flower petal from Acerola. The goal is to collect seven different kinds of petals.

Name: Red Petal
Desc: A pressed flower petal from Kiawe. The goal is to collect seven different kinds of petals.

Name: Yellow Petal
Desc: A pressed flower petal from Sophocles. The goal is to collect seven different kinds of petals.

Name: Attack Mint
Desc: When a Pokémon smells this mint, its nature will change.

Name: Defense Mint
Desc: When a Pokémon smells this mint, its nature will change.

Name: Neutral Mint
Desc: When a Pokémon smells this mint, its nature will change.

Name: Sp.Atk Mint
Desc: When a Pokémon smells this mint, its nature will change.

Name: Sp.Def Mint
Desc: When a Pokémon smells this mint, its nature will change.

Name: Speed Mint
Desc: When a Pokémon smells this mint, its nature will change.

Name: Exp. Share
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder gets a share of Exp. Points without eating.

Name: Luminous Moss
Desc: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def if the holder is hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.

Name: Super Repel
Desc: An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon from jumping out at you for a while. It lasts longer than Super Repel.

Name: Festival Ticket
Desc: A ticket that allows you to host a mission in Festival Plaza.

Name: Reveal Glass
Desc: A looking glass that reveals the truth. It’s a mysterious glass that returns a Pokémon to its original shape.

Name: Zygarde Cube
Desc: An item to store Zygarde Cores and Cells. You can also use it to change Zygarde’s form.

Name: Black Augurite
Desc: A glassy black stone that produces a sharp cutting edge when split. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.

Name: Peat Block
Desc: A block of muddy material that can be used as fuel for burning when it is dried. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.

Name: Linking Cord
Desc: A string exuding a mysterious energy that makes you feel a strange sense of connection. It’s loved by certain Pokémon.

Name: Blank Plate
Desc: A stone tablet imbued with the essence of normalcy. When used on a certain Pokémon, it allows that Pokémon to gain the power of the Normal type.

Name: Legend Plate
Desc: A stone tablet imbued with the essence of all creation. When used on a certain Pokémon, it allows that Pokémon to gain the power of every type there is.

Name: Large Leek
Desc: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. Whether this is the kind of vegetable stalk that Farfetch’d like is unknown.

Name: Gigantamix
Desc: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. A mysterious spice. Even a tiny sprinkle is sure to make a curry gigantic.
